F2.App.name: F2.App
F2.App.description: The App object represents an App's meta data

F2.AppAssets.name: F2.AppAssets
F2.AppAssets.description: The assets needed to render an App on the page

F2.ContainerConfiguration.name: F2.ContainerConfiguration
F2.ContainerConfiguration.description: An object containing configuration information for the Container

F2.Constants.name: F2.Constants
F2.Constants.description: Constants used throughout the Open Financial Framework

F2.Constants.Sockets.name: F2.Constants.Sockets
F2.Constants.Sockets.description: Constants for use with cross-domain sockets

F2.Constants.Views.name: F2.Constants.Views
F2.Constants.Views.description:
The available view types to Apps. The view should be specified by applying
the {{#crossLink "F2.Constants.Css"}}{{/crossLink}}.APP_VIEW class to thecontaining DOM Element. A 
DATA_ATTRIBUTE attribute should be added to the Element as well which defines
what view type is represented.

classitems.description: Class stubs for documentation purposes
The unique ID of the App
classitems.name: appId

classitems.description:
A JSON string of data that will be passed to the
server when an App request is made.
classitems.name: data

classitems.description: The description of the App
classitems.name: description

classitems.description: The company of the developer
classitems.name: developerCompany

classitems.description: The name of the developer
classitems.name: developerName

classitems.description: The url of the developer
classitems.name: developerUrl

classitems.description:
True if the App should be requested in a single request with other Apps. The
App must have isSecure = false.
classitems.name: enableBatchRequests

classitems.description:
The height of the App. The initial height will be pulled from
the {{#crossLink "F2.App"}}{{/crossLink}} object, but later modified by firing an 
{{#crossLink "F2.Constants.Events"}}{{/crossLink}}.APP_HEIGHT_CHANGE event.
classitems.name: height

classitems.description: The unique runtime ID of the App
classitems.name: instanceId

classitems.description:
True if the App will be loaded in an iframe. This property
will be true if the {{#crossLink "F2.App"}}{{/crossLink}} object sets isSecure = true. It will 
also be true if the Container has decided to run Apps in iframes.
classitems.name: isSecure

classitems.description:
The recommended maximum width in pixels that this app should be run.
It is up to the Container to implement the logic to prevent an App
from being run when the maxWidth requirements are not met.
classitems.name: maxWidth

classitems.description:
The recommended minimum grid size that this app should be run. This
value corresponds to the 12-grid system that is used by the Container.
This property should be set by Apps that require a certain number of 
columns in their layout.
classitems.name: minGridSize

classitems.description:
The recommended minimum width in pixels that this app should be 
run. It is up to the Container to implement the logic to prevent
an App from being run when the minWidth requirements are not met.
classitems.name: minWidth

classitems.description: The name of the App
classitems.name: name

classitems.description:
Sets the title of the App as shown in the browser. Depending on the Container
HTML, this method may do nothing if the Container has not been configured 
properly or else the Container Provider does not allow Title's to be set.
classitems.name: setTitle

classitems.description:
For secure apps, this method updates the size of the iframe that contains
the App
classitems.name: updateHeight

classitems.description: The url of the App
classitems.name: url

classitems.description:
The views that this App supports. Available views
are defined in {{#crossLink "F2.Constants.Views"}}{{/crossLink}}. The presence of a view can be checked
via F2.{{#crossLink "F2/inArray"}}{{/crossLink}}:

    F2.inArray(F2.Constants.Views.SETTINGS, app.views)

The {{#crossLink "F2.Constants.Views"}}{{/crossLink}}.HOME view should always be present.
classitems.name: views

classitems.description: The array of {{#crossLink "F2.AppAssets.AppContent"}}{{/crossLink}} objects
classitems.name: Apps

classitems.description: Any inline javascript tha should initially be run
classitems.name: InlineScripts

classitems.description: Urls to javascript files required by the App
classitems.name: Scripts

classitems.description: Urls to CSS files required by the App
classitems.name: Styles

classitems.description: Arbitrary data to be passed along with the App
classitems.name: Data

classitems.description: The string of HTML representing the App
classitems.name: Html

classitems.description: The unique runtime ID of the App
classitems.name: InstanceId

classitems.description: A status message
classitems.name: Status

classitems.description:
Allows the Container to wrap an App in extra html. The
function should accept an {{#crossLink "F2.App"}}{{/crossLink}} object and also a string of html.
The extra html can provide links to edit app settings and remove an app from the
Container. See {{#crossLink "F2.Constants.Css"}}{{/crossLink}} for CSS classes that should be applied to elements.
classitems.name: appWrapper

classitems.description:
Allows the Container to override how an App's html is 
inserted into the page. The function should accept an {{#crossLink "F2.App"}}{{/crossLink}} object
and also a string of html
classitems.name: appWriter

classitems.description:
Tells the Container that it is currently running within
a secure app page
classitems.name: isSecureAppPage

classitems.description:
Allows the Container to specify which page is used when
loading a secure app. The page must reside on a different domain than the Container
classitems.name: secureAppPagePath

classitems.description:
Specifies what views a Container will provide buttons
or liks to. Generally, the views will be switched via buttons or links in the App's
header. The {{#crossLink "F2.Constants.Views"}}{{/crossLink}}.HOME view should always be present.
classitems.name: supportedViews

classitems.description:
The APP class should be applied to the DOM Element that surrounds the entire App,
including any extra html that surrounds the APP\_CONTAINER that is inserted 
by the Container. See appWrapper property in the {{#crossLink "F2.ContainerConfiguration"}}{{/crossLink}}
object.
classitems.name: APP

classitems.description:
The APP\_CONTAINER class should be applied to the outermost DOM Element
of the App.
classitems.name: APP_CONTAINER
APP_TITLE

classitems.description:
The APP\_VIEW class should be applied to the DOM Element that contains
a view for an App. The DOM Element should also have a {{#crossLink "F2.Constants.Views"}}{{/crossLink}}.DATA_ATTRIBUTE
attribute that specifies which {{#crossLink "F2.Constants.Views"}}{{/crossLink}} it is.
classitems.name: APP_VIEW

classitems.description:
APP\_VIEW\_TRIGGER class shuld be applied to the DOM Elements that
trigger an {{#crossLink "F2.Constants.Events"}}{{/crossLink}}.APP_VIEW_CHANGE event. The DOM Element
should also have a {{#crossLink "F2.Constants.Views"}}{{/crossLink}}.DATA_ATTRIBUTE attribute that
specifies which {{#crossLink "F2.Constants.Views"}}{{/crossLink}} it will trigger.
classitems.name: APP_VIEW_TRIGGER
APPLICATION_LOAD

classitems.description:
The APP\_WIDTH\_CHANGE event will be fired by the Container when the width
of an App is changed. The App's instanceId should be concatenated to this
constant.
Returns an object with the gridSize and width in pixels:

    { gridSize:8, width:620 }
classitems.name: APP_WIDTH_CHANGE

classitems.description:
The APP\_SYMBOL\_CHANGE event is fired when the symbol is changed in an App. It 
is up to the App developer to fire this event.
Returns an object with the symbol and company name:

    { symbol: "MSFT", name: "Microsoft Corp (NASDAQ)" }
classitems.name: APP_SYMBOL_CHANGE

classitems.description:
The APP\_VIEW\_CHANGE event will be fired by the Container when a user clicks
to switch the view for an App. The App's instanceId should be concatenated
to this constant.
classitems.name: APP_VIEW_CHANGE

classitems.description:
The CONTAINER\_SYMBOL\_CHANGE event is fired when the symbol is changed at the Container
level. This event should only be fired by the Container or Container Provider.
Returns an object with the symbol and company name:

    { symbol: "MSFT", name: "Microsoft Corp (NASDAQ)" }
classitems.name: CONTAINER_SYMBOL_CHANGE

classitems.description:
The CONTAINER\_WIDTH\_CHANGE event will be fired by the Container when the width
of the Container has changed.
classitems.name: CONTAINER_WIDTH_CHANGE

classitems.description: The APP\_RPC message is sent when a method on an App object is called.
classitems.name: APP_RPC

classitems.description:
The LOAD message is sent when an iframe socket initially loads.
Returns a JSON string that represents:

    [ App, AppAssets]
classitems.name: LOAD

classitems.description: The ABOUT view gives details about the App.
classitems.name: ABOUT

classitems.description: The HELP view provides users with help information for using an App.
classitems.name: HELP

classitems.description:
The HOME view is the main view for an App. This view should always
be provided by an App.
classitems.name: HOME

classitems.description:
The REMOVE view is a special view that handles the removal of an App
from the Container.
classitems.name: REMOVE

classitems.description:
The SETTINGS view provides users the ability to modify advanced settings
for an App.
classitems.name: SETTINGS

classitems.description: Creates a socket connection from the App to the Container
classitems.name: _createAppToContainerSocket

classitems.description: Creates a socket connection from the Container to the App using easyXDM
classitems.name: _createContainerToAppSocket

classitems.description: Function to render the html for an App.
classitems.name: _getAppHtml

classitems.description: Adds properties and methods to the App object
classitems.name: _hydrateApp

classitems.description:
creates two functions on the App from the function
passed in if the app is secure. the 'incoming' function
will be called when a message is received via the 
socket connection
classitems.name: rpc

params.name: fnRemote
params.description:
The remote function which will be
called first and its return value passed across the socket
into the main function ('fn')

classitems.description: Attach App events
classitems.name: _initAppEvents

classitems.description: Attach Container Events
classitems.name: _initContainerEvents

classitems.description: Loads the App's html/css/javascript
classitems.name: loadApp

classitems.description: Loads the App's html/css/javascript into an iframe
classitems.name: loadSecureApp

params.name: appAssets
params.description: The App's html/css/js to be loaded into the page.

classitems.description: Checks if the App is valid
classitems.name: _validateApp

return.description: True if the App is valid

classitems.description: Appends the App's html to the DOM
classitems.name: _writeAppHtml

classitems.description:
Initializes the Container. This method must be called before performing any other
actions in the Container.
classitems.name: init

classitems.description:
Begins the loading process for all Apps. The App will
be passed the {{#crossLink "F2.App"}}{{/crossLink}} object which will contain the App's unique
instanceId within the Container. Optionally, the {{#crossLink "F2.AppAssets"}}{{/crossLink}}
can be passed in and those assets will be used instead of making a request.
classitems.name: registerApps

params.name: appAssets
params.description:
An array of {{#crossLink "F2.AppAssets"}}{{/crossLink}}
objects. This array must be the same length as the apps array that is passed in.
This can be useful if Apps are loaded on the server-side and passed down to the
client.

classitems.description: Removes all Apps from the Container
classitems.name: removeAllApps

classitems.description: Removes an App from the Container
classitems.name: removeApp

classitems.description: Generates a somewhat random id
classitems.name: guid

classitems.description: Wrapper logging function.
classitems.name: log

classitems.description: Search for a value within an array.
classitems.name: inArray

classitems.description:
Creates a namespace on F2 and copies the contents of an object into
that namespace optionally overwriting existing properties.
classitems.name: extend

params.name: ns
params.description:
The namespace to create. Pass a falsy value to 
add properties to the F2 namespace directly.

params.name: obj
params.description: The object to copy into the namespace.

params.name: overwrite
params.description: True if object properties should be overwritten

classitems.description: Wrapper to convert a JSON string to an object
classitems.name: parse

classitems.description: Wrapper to convert an object to JSON
classitems.name: stringify
